title: Is there any proof that Chanakya existed? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of the proofs come from Brahmin's literature… Greek Megasthenes wrote a lot about Indian teachers, philosophers, Kings, and others in his book (ref. The Historical Setting of Megasthenes' Indica)…He didn’t mention Chankaya at all…someone raised the point of “white lies”…How come…?… So Megasthenes planed way long back about this situation…and didn’t mention Chanakya’s name in his writing… Even not in Alexander’s literature…In fact, It is mentioned a Jain Muni { Kalanos, also spelled Calanus (c. 398 – 323 BCE) was a gymnosophist (literally "naked philosopher"), a philosopher from Taxila } met with Alexander and Alexander got impressed with him…and took him to Bacteria…but Alexander got died in midway…That Jain Muni is a well-known personality in Greek literature... None of the Buddhist scripts talks about his name…Only and only one Jain script (written by Jain writer Hemachandra) has his name which was written in 12 century after Tirupati / Bukka-Raya Sandhi…Probably a compromise and a way to save themselves from mass massacre done by ManuVadis and accepted their supremacy ( It is written…more than 8000 Jain Munis were assassinated in a single day by ManuVadis and later this killing kept going till the time they completely wiped out Shraman Sanskriti from South…captured more than 1000 Jain temples and other Buddhist temples as well…)…Well, this not a topic we are discussing here but it is required to expose the intentions of doing the fabrication of real History…! *Mudrarakshasa was written around in 10 century ( as it has the endorsement of Huns invasion…definitely not a composition of Gupta era )...Not a composition of Gupta period…Not a strong proof that can prove his existence. It is a Drama composed of that time… Not a book that can be trusted for historical facts…In fact, it is written in Mudrarakshasa that ChandraGupt Maurya was a Shudra ( fabrication by ManuVadi Bramhins )…but in reality, He was from a ShakyaVanshi clan, which was part of Gautama Buddha’s clan…got separated when King of Kaushala attacked Shakyas…Lived in PippliVan which was famous for Peacocks (Moore)…that’s why they called Mauryas…well described in several Buddha & Jain Granths like MahaBodhiVansh ( महाबोधिवंस in DevNagri language ), MahaParivibbasutta( महापारिनिब्बासुत्त in DevNagri language ), Divyavadant( दिव्यावदान्त in DevNagri language ), DeepVansh( दीपवंश in DevNagri language )…As far as MahaVansh( महावंश in DevNagri language ) is a concern, It is purely a malfunction narration as there are several incidents mentioned which are doubtful to accept…& another thing…Buddhism is harmed by those Brahmans also who accepted it & were translating Buddhist literature into Bramhani literature…There were many Brahmans who moved to Sri-Lanka from Tamilnadu-AndraPradesh-Kerla…When it was the time of 19 century when all lost Granths-Purans were being translated into Nagri-Hindi…At that time they played with the real history…were creating fabricated copies of Buddhist Buddhas-Bodhisattvas-Nayakas-MahaNayakas stories…If you read Buddhist Jataka tales( 547 stories & many more in other Granths..), you will find all the Hindu characters…like King Harishchandra, Bodhisattva Ram, Agastya muni, Matang muni, Shraman Kumar, MahaKapi, Arjun, Vidur, Visvakarma, Kanha-Krishnaa and all others mentioned in Hindu tales…all stolen from Buddhist literature… Now more important thing is, In Buddhism there are 28 Buddhas mentioned born on land on JambuDeep…But Hinduism destroyed Shraman Sanskriti & included Gautam Buddha as an incarnation of VISHNU..whereas there is no VISHNU concept in Buddhism…How come a Buddhist God has a new Hindu God appearance…??? None of has any text about Chanakya-Kautilya…!!! ARTHASHASTRA is not proof of his existence…It is a collection of political diplomacy principles…Not historical facts… None of any foreign visitors from China / Greece / Persia / Persia / Morocco / and even those who studied in Nalanda / Takshila mentioned such a huge personality named Chanakya…! Brahmans always have been playing the game of patriotism…They created Chanakya just to cover up the massacre done by Brahman Pusyamitra Sung…Pusyamitra Sung has been highlighted as a protector from Greeks…Greeks had been conquering Asia since Alexander but they had a pact with Magadh (Chandragupt / they would never attack Magadh…)... King Malandra I conquered Punjab which was not part of Magadh at that time ( after the death of Ashoka, most of the GanRajyas-states declared themself free from Magadha when they got the advance knowledge of iron - metals & other things…)… Brahmans Highlighted King Malandra I as invader because he became a Buddhist later…This is how they play the patriotism card…every time there was someone who was invader & they were protecting Bharat from that Invader… hence proves and questioned the existence of Chanakya…!

प्राचीन भारत के किसी भी शिलालेख में चाणक्य के बारे में कोई जानकारी नहीं मिलती है। धार्मिक अंधे लोग चाणक्य के होने को सही मानते हैं। यहाँ सोचने वाली बात है कि जब मनुस्मृति द्वारा शूद्र को राजा नही बनाया जाता तो उस समय का वर्णवादी ब्राह्मण किसी शूद्र को राजा कैसे बना सकता है। जबकि इतिहास में यह दर्ज है कि शिवाजी महाराज के साथ एक ब्राह्मण बिना नहाये बायें पैर के अंगूठे से राज्याभिषेक करने को तैयार होता है।एक पल को मान लेते हैं कि चाणक्य था जिसने चन्द्रगुप्त को राजा बनाया तो राजा द्वारा इस उपकार को चुकाया जाना चाहिए (शिलालेखों द्वारा) जबकि ऐसा कुछ नही किया गया। इससे स्पष्ट हो सकता है कि चाणक्य नहीं था और चन्द्रगुप्त अपने पराक्रम से राजा बना। मेरी बात का खंडन करने के लिए कोई पढ़ लिख कर एक साक्ष्य (pdf) प्रस्तुत कर सकता है।
